seo.title: Hostel Brikette → ferry dock, with luggage
seo.description: Step-by-step route from the hostel to Positano’s ferry dock using the Interno bus and porters.

linkLabel: Hostel Brikette → ferry dock, with luggage
intro: Departing Hostel Brikette with luggage? Ride the Interno Positano bus downhill and let the dock porters move heavy bags so you reach the ferry without wrestling Positano’s staircases.
beforeList: Check the current Interno Positano timetable — here’s the [latest schedule and fares](https://forum.amalfi.com/t/mobility-amalfi-coast-bus-positano-nocelle-praiano/26).
Pick up Interno Positano tickets at the tabacchi beside Chiesa Nuova before boarding (or ask reception to confirm stock).
Arrange porter help if you have bulky bags — reception can call ahead, or see the [porter service guide](guide:porterServices) for numbers and pricing.

sections.title: Hostel entrance to the Chiesa Nuova stop
body: Check out, then follow the main staircase down to Viale Pasitea and turn left (downhill). Walk just over 100 metres (330 ft) to the tabacchi/newsstand you used on arrival.
The Interno Positano bus stop is immediately beside the tabacchi. Have tickets ready; if you need more, buy them inside before the bus arrives.

sections.title: Ride the Interno Positano bus to Piazza dei Mulini
body: Board the Interno Positano bus — the destination board reads "interno positano". Keep luggage either on your lap or in the centre area so aisles stay clear.
Stay on for roughly 10 minutes until the Piazza dei Mulini stop (the last major stop before the pedestrian zone). Let the driver know you are heading to the beach if you are unsure.

sections.title: Piazza dei Mulini to the ferry dock
body: Step off the bus, meet the porters if you pre-booked them, and walk straight into the pedestrian-only lane leading to Spiaggia Grande.

Follow the promenade downhill for about 7 minutes — use [these directions](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Brikette+Hostel,+Via+G.+Marconi,+358,+84017+Positano+SA/Positano+Spiaggia/@40.6290767,14.4840629,16z/data=!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x133b97669dd0003b:0xf11f22a59b1b00da!2m2!1d14.480818!2d40.629634!1m5!1m1!1s0x133b976916d1a44d:0xf1e08d61658b4291!2m2!1d14.4878892!2d40.6276549!3e2) to stay on the smoothest ramp sections.
At the ferry pier, check in with your operator. Porters deliver luggage separately; keep passports, medication, and valuables with you.

stepsList: Buy Interno Positano bus tickets at the Chiesa Nuova tabacchi and confirm porter availability.
Walk 100 m downhill from the hostel to the Chiesa Nuova bus stop and wait on the seaside of Viale Pasitea.
Ride the Interno Positano bus to Piazza dei Mulini (last major stop before the beach).
Meet the porters and follow the promenade to the ferry pier while they move heavy bags.
kneesList: Using the Interno Positano bus replaces hundreds of steep steps with a short, level walk.
Porters can take suitcases on separate trolleys so you only manage a daypack on the promenade.

faqs.q: Where can I buy Interno Positano tickets near the hostel?
a: The tabacchi/newsstand beside the Chiesa Nuova stop keeps tickets in stock, and reception can confirm same-day availability. Drivers do not sell tickets onboard.

faqs.q: How far in advance should I request the porters?
a: In summer call 30–45 minutes before you want to leave so they can meet you at Piazza dei Mulini. During quieter months, 15 minutes is usually enough — reception can call on your behalf.

faqs.q: What if the Interno bus is not running when I depart?
a: If services pause late at night, ask porters to take luggage all the way down and walk the promenade yourself, or use a SITA bus toward Sponda (runs later) and continue downhill on foot.

howtoSteps: Confirm tickets and porters at Chiesa Nuova
Walk downhill from the hostel to the Chiesa Nuova bus stop
Ride the Interno Positano bus to Piazza dei Mulini
Meet porters and walk the promenade to the ferry pier
